title: Super Bowl MVP winner ends 28-year wait after Seahawks' triumph as Sam Darnold misses out
tags: Seattle Seahawks destroy New England Patriots to win Super Bowl after humiliating performances;Who is Sam Darnold: The forgotten free agent who won his first Super Bowl for the Seattle Seahawks;Super Bowl suffers delay after streaker runs onto field - before being tackled by Patriots player;The GB News Editorial Charter
